title: Bug 47910: ajc outjar jarfile does not contain MANIFEST.MF
description: When using ajc with the outjar option, the resulting jar file does not include a MANIFEST.MF file inside it.
OB: Currently, when using the outjar option with ajc, the resulting jar file does not have a MANIFEST.MF file inside it.
EB: Expected behavior is that when the outjar option is used with ajc, the resulting file should be a valid jar file, which includes a MANIFEST.MF file inside it.
SR: To reproduce this issue, try compiling a Java project using ajc with the outjar option. Then, inspect the resulting jar file and verify if it contains a MANIFEST.MF file inside it.
